column3: TransitionText
See a cute cat
My roommates didn’t wash the dishes so I can't eat
Someone knocks on the front door
Realize the person I was angry at doesn’t care
I do some breathing exercises
Finds somewhere to place anger
I don’t know why I'm crying
I have cried out all my tears
See my friends having fun without me
This assignment is not as easy as I thought it was
Watched the news
Receive a gift from a loved one
I can't figure out a problem
I figure out a solution to a problem
Someone helps me with a problem
My friend chose someone else for a group project
The gift on my bed is from my parents
A surprise party! For me!
I see my crush talking to someone else
I get rejected
I see the card I made for someone in the trash
My friend lied about being busy with someone else
The people I’m jealous of don’t care
There is nothing to be jealous about
